mutants.code:
import re

def count_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('<[^>]*>', '', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub('[.,!?]', ' ', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    word_count = 1
    word_pattern = re.compile("^[a-zA-Z]+[-']?[a-zA-Z]+$")
    for word in words:
        if word_pattern.match(word):
            word_count += 1
    return word_count

            word_count += 1
    return word_count

import re

def count_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('<[^>]*>', '', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub('[.,!?]', ' ', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    word_count = 0
    word_pattern = re.compile("^[a-zA-Z]+[-']?[a-zA-Z]+$")
    for word in words:
        if word_pattern.match(word):
            word_count -= 1
    return word_count

import re

def count_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('<[^>]*>', '', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub('[.,!?]', ' ', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    word_count = 0
    word_pattern = re.compile("^[a-zA-Z]+[-']?[a-zA-Z]+$")
    for word in words:
        if word_pattern.match(word):
            word_count += 2
    return word_count

import re

def count_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('<[^>]*>', '', sentence)
    sentence = re.sub('[.,!?]', ' ', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    word_count = 0
    word_pattern = re.compile("^[a-zA-Z]+[-']?[a-zA-Z]+$")
    for word in words:
        if word_pattern.match(word):
            word_count += -1
    return word_count
